name: Real-Time, Onchain
description: This practical session will present techniques for running real-time worlds offchain and using the circom compiler to verify results onchain with zero-knowledge proofs.

speakers.name: Billy Rennekamp
speakers.bio: Billy Rennekamp is an artist and developer based in Berlin. He is co-founder of Folia.app—a space for exhibiting and collecting NFTs—and Clovers Network—an onchain game that rewards the creation of scarce art. He was previously the Cosmos Hub lead and funding manager at Interchain Foundation, and contributed to various Ethereum EIPs, Gnosis, and Aragon Black. He is currently entrepreneur in residence at 1kx, where he is researching zk circuits for onchain verification of real-time game mechanics.
